title: Sunlight and Homemade Bread: A Cozy Anime Kitchen
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, detailed illustration, 2D anime style, slice of life, Ghibli aesthetic, 16:9 aspect ratio, a heartwarming scene of a smiling elderly woman (grandmother/obasan) with neat gray hair, wearing a floral apron, happily kneading a large mound of fresh bread dough on a rustic wooden countertop. The cozy, traditional kitchen is bathed in soft morning sunlight streaming through the large window with orange checkered curtains. Full scene view, warm colors, inviting atmosphere.
